mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Van Winkle, P. G. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Van Winkle, P. G.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Hill encountered a Body of Seventy five 75 Rebels yesterday and a larger body is about him it is feared he is surrounded the troops here should go to Kanawha station & thence to the oil wells. Orders have just come from Kelly for the troops to remain here this may be the sacrifice of Hills command P.G. Van W [Peter G. Van Winkle]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Van Winkle, P. G.
no location given

Pierpont, Francis H.
